attributes.action: abolish bus lanes on roads to reduce congestion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By scrapping bus lanes the flow of traffic at peak times will be reduced as there will be 1 extra lane for traffic to use. Congestion will be reduced and there will be no need for a road pricing scheme. On most main roads approx. 20 buses will use a bus lane per hour. This is a waste of road space and can be put to better use by allowing all vehicles to use them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
